ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
And( Additional_Freight_Presentation__c = true, (or( and ( ISBLANK( Jewellery_Qty_Connotes__c ),
not( ISBLANK( Jewellery_Qty_Items__c ))),
and ( ISBLANK( Jewellery_Qty_Items__c ),
not( ISBLANK( Jewellery_Qty_Connotes__c ))))))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please make sure that you have entered a value for Jewellery Qty Items and Medical Qty Connotes fields for Additional Freight Presentation
